comment: Pretty hard class, especially for an intro class, but he is an AMAZING Professor who really cares and is passionate about Biology. While the class is hard, he is aware and gives tons of opportunities for extra credit. I started pretty much failing the class and ended up passing with a "B”.

He is a dedicated and wonderful educator. He truly cares about his students' learning and being able to pass his class, and he is truly passionate about Biology. With that being said, this class was very hard, and I would not take it again unless I was majoring in Biology. If you are just taking the class to satisfy the gen ed requirement, beware.

Professor Krout is the best! He answers emails asap. He has lots meetings available if you need help. Weekly homework and quizzes. Very helpful and wants you to succeed in his class. I would def recommend professor krout!

Dr. Krout was amazing!!! He is a great professor that made Bio really easy. 4 exams plus a final all lockdown +cam. Weekly quiz (Not Lockdown) and HW. Lecture video, notes, and PPT. All of the answers and help can be found on Quizlet. Dr. Krout wants you to pass and will do his part. If you somehow fail his class you really just didn't try.

Homework assignments each week along with some pretty lengthy lectures.. but overall a great teacher! Super caring and flexible, makes the course fairly simple to understand. Tests are pretty hard, but just depends on how much you prepare. Other than that, quizzes and assignments are easy. Provides plenty of resources and different study material!

10/10 recommend this professor. Taking him as an architecture student was the best decision because explains the material that can be understood from a non-biology major.  The test can be difficult, but he gives opportunities to better your grade. Would 1000% retake him.
Pretty good professor. Has makeup opportunities for missed discussions and some extra credit opportunities after exams.

1107* One of the best professors I've had in college. Tests were a little hard, but he made sure you had plenty of opportunities to make it up. He answers emails fast and genuinely cares about all of his students. I would recommend him to anyone going into biology! This is only his second year I believe and is open for feedback all the time. +rep!!
very cool professor had him for bio lab spring'24. He makes sure all of his students understand the lab and material taught.

I don't normally do well in science. He provided a lot of content and even extra videos to help you if you don't get it after the lecture videos. Homework can get a bit extensive but it's expected for this type of class. He is very responsive outside of class and gives plenty of opportunities to have meetings so he can answer any questions.

Professor Krout is amazing!!!! I took his class online and ended with an A+. You can really tell how passionate he is about science. He reaches out all the time and answers rather fast. I highly recommend him.

Dr Krout is a great professor. There are many opportunities to earn points in his class, from quizzes to homework to discussions. The tests are the hardest part, and they cover a lot of material which could be slimmed down. I think the class has like 90 students but he's still very responsive and is available on office hours and via email.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr Krout is a really nice professor. He responds to emails and also has office hours. His assignments are really easy, but his exams are soo hard and confusing. I found it hard passing his exams. I would advise to take him if he is your only option.

I had Dr. Krout for Bio1101 lab and he is a very kind and understanding professor who made all students feel comfortable participating in class. He is extremely communicative by email and he has consistent office hours every week. His grading material is extremely clear and if you follow directions you will make an A+ in this class.

Even though we were online, Dr.Krout still showed that he is available to anyone! He is caring makes sure that if we have ANY issues with ANYTHING,you could go to his office hours or even Zoom calls. His homework and quizzes are easy , all you have to do is read the textbook that is online and look at any videos provided in the modules.
I took him on online, it was easy! and the professor is very nice and caring, the homework's are very easy and understandable, and he has videos about his powerpoints!

Dr. Krout was an amazing professor. He would stay after class and help with whatever you needed. He help office hours and even sent out emails to make sure you don't miss any deadlines. I would take him again if I could!
